# defaultLayout

**Type Property**

Center the preview in a container the size of the device on which the preview is running.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor static var defaultLayout: PreviewTrait<Preview.ViewTraits> { get }
```

## Discussion

This is the same as the [doc://com.apple.DeveloperToolsSupport/documentation/DeveloperToolsSupport/PreviewLayout/device] layout, and is the default if you don’t specify a layout trait.
